channel.title: [317][PI] Barrows disconnect
channel.description:
Hey guys
I have a quick question, when doing barrows on my server (you actually have to do it like in real RS, digging and killing 5 of them, then go into the tunnel) you get disconnected when going into the tunnel. Does anybody know how I can fix that? Thanks in advance.

item.title: [317][PI] Barrows disconnect
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

[quote=“043scape, post:1, topic:450523”]Hey guys

I have a quick question, when doing barrows on my server (you actually have to do it like in real RS, digging and killing 5 of them, then go into the tunnel) you get disconnected when going into the tunnel. Does anybody know how I can fix that? Thanks in advance.[/quote]

Take a picture of the run.bat of your server when it disconnects you, i’d like to see what it says.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][PI] Barrows disconnect
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Soulsplit (317) also had this problem, which is an earlier version of P.I.

It’s disconnecting when you reach the tunnel which leads underground? When exactly is it disconnecting? Also take a screenshot of the error it throws. If It’s the exact same problem as Soulsplit, then it will give an error.

Read full topic
